longBusinessSummary: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company manufactures and sells optical fiber and cable products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Optical Fibres and Optical Fibre Preforms, and Optical Fibre Cables segments. It offers communication optical fibers, cable products, specialty fibers, integrated cabling products, optical distribution frames, optical transceivers, coaxial cables, and cable manufacturing equipment. The company also provides copper wire and related products; integrated wiring systems; germanium tetrachlorides for optical fibers; technical development consulting services for computer hardware and software and ancillary equipment; and vapor and chemical raw materials. In addition, it offers solutions to telecom operators, cloud and data centers, smart campus, railway transportation, education, power grids, and consumer electronics, as well as the government. Further, the company imports, exports, and sells submarine cables, optical cables, and other power cables and their accessories, as well as trades in raw materials; and installs cables, accessories, and systems related to various submarine projects. Additionally, it provides general contracting engineering; equity investment and related management consulting; optical communication research and promotion; and medical materials research services, as well as integrated services in communication, computer, intelligent building, weak current system, and software development. Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.
longName: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company
